import * as React from 'react'; import { useGetAccountInfo, DappUI } from '@elrondnetwork/dapp-core'; import { contractAddress } from 'config'; const RegisterInfo = () => { const { address, account } = useGetAccountInfo(); const isRegistered = Boolean(address); return (
{isRegistered && (

Register to Vote

Your address: {address}
Contract address: {contractAddress}

)}

Register to Vote

Your address: {address}
Contract address: {contractAddress}

); }; export default RegisterInfo;
